awd_titl_txt: Connection of Loras College, Clarke College and Umiversity  of Dubuque to CICNet
awd_abstract_narration: Loras College, Clarke College, and the University of Dubuque                    request support from NSF for connection of their campuses to                    CICnet as an affiliate member through the University ofIowa.                    CICNet is the midlevel network located in this part of the state                of Iowa that will provide operations and network information                    services.  It will give the colleges a 56 thousand bits per                     second connection to the NSFNET, a high speed (1.5 - 45 million                 bits per second) National Backbone network.                                                                                                                     The colleges needs greater functionality and network speed to be                able to access supercomputers, libraries, and make file transfers               along with being able to implement a more reliable mail system.                 Students and faculty research will benefit from the link.  This                 is also a unique opportunity for the school to explore innovative               educational resources.***//
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
